mapper.select: SELECT `c`.`complainID`, `c`.`appointmentID`, `c`.`symptomID`, `c`.`durationNum`, `c`.`durationType`, `c`.`detail`, s.name AS symptomName FROM `complain` c JOIN symptom s ON c.symptomID = s.id WHERE c.`appointmentID`= #{appointmentID}
mapper.update: UPDATE complain SET symptomID = #{symptomID}, detail = #{detail}, durationNum = #{durationNum}, durationType = #{durationType} WHERE appointmentID = #{appointmentID}
